entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
